Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following parameters: Coordinate System: - Euler Angles: [0.0, 0.0, -90.0] - Translation Vector: [0.0028, 0.0357, 0.0] Create the base sketch for the prism on the X-Y plane of the new coordinate system. This will create the final shape for Part 1.</description>
